Name: Rieger-C3 Module
Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Module (Passive)

Optimal Charge Window: +10%
Resistance: +6%

The Rieger-C3 Module modifies a mining laser's targeting system to locate and exploit micro-fractures within a deposit. Although the deposit's resistance is increased, the optimal charge safe-zone for the deposit is increased.
